comments.author: Marisa
comments.content: Lovely use of pineapple. I bet this adds a lot of spunk to main dishes.

comments.author: Rebecca
comments.content: Here's how I peel a pineapple: http://anniesdelectation.blogspot.com/2009/05/tropical-sauerkraut-or-how-to-peel.html The main difference is that I peel it thinner, wasting less of the flesh.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: That is an interesting technique with the spiral trenches! Thanks for sharing.

comments.author: Cate Stone
comments.content: This sounds great. It would be a great accompaniment to some marinated tofu, also chargrilled, and help with digestion. The simple things! http://www.chitteringvalleyretreat.com.au/index.html

comments.author: John
comments.content: Delicious! A little watery after it sits a while, but the "water" is really good. The balance of flavors overall is really nice.
